summary: A greedy businessman-turned-renegade foments an Indian uprising against the coming telegraph to perpetuate his economic stranglehold on the territory.
cast: John Wayne|Duke|Frank McHugh|Marceline Day|Otis Harlan|Albert J. Smith|Yakima Canutt|Lafe McKee|Chuck Baldra|Chief John Big Tree|Bob Burns|Ben Corbett|Frank Ellis|Bob Fleming|Clarence Geldart|Jack Jones|Jack Kirk|Ken Maynard|Bud McClure|Artie Ortego|Bud Osborne|Tarzan|Al Taylor|Blackjack Ward|Slim Whitaker
keywords: no cowboys in this film|b movie|b western|renegade indian|indian attack
title: The Telegraph Trail
